languages.text: "Внешние палаты шпиля Опустошительной бури. Этот почтенный кабал пригласил нас на маленькое празднество. Ядовитый шепот прибыл как желанные союзники, Уязвленные небеса... ума не приложу, зачем было звать их".

traits.locale_text: "Внешние палаты шпиля Опустошительной бури. Этот почтенный кабал пригласил нас на маленькое празднество. Ядовитый шепот прибыл как желанные союзники, Кровоточащие небеса... ума не приложу, зачем было звать их".
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."
languages.original_text: "Внешние палаты шпиля Опустошительной бури. Этот почтенный кабал пригласил нас на маленькое празднество. Ядовитый шепот прибыл как желанные союзники, Уязвленные небеса... ума не приложу, зачем было звать их".

traits.locale_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I fail to see the reason for their invitation."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

traits.locale_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I fail to see the reason for their invitation."

traits.locale_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

traits.locale_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

traits.locale_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: « Dans une salle annexe de la tour de la Tempête ravageuse. La noble Kabale nous a conviés pour une petite fête. Le Murmure empoisonné a été invité en tant qu'allié potentiel. Quant aux Cieux blessés... je ne parviens pas à trouver une raison valable de les convier. »
languages.original_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."

traits.locale_text: « Dans une salle annexe de la tour de la Tempête ravageuse. La noble Kabale nous a conviés pour une petite fête. Le Murmure empoisonné a été invité en tant qu'allié potentiel. Quant aux Cieux blessés... je ne parviens pas à trouver une raison valable de les convier. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: “这里是狂风阴谋团尖塔的外殿。尊敬的狂风阴谋团邀请我们参加小型庆祝活动，我们毒语阴谋团是他们的盟友。至于裂空阴谋团……我不知道怎么会有人打算邀请他们。”
languages.original_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."

traits.locale_text: “这里是狂风阴谋团尖塔的外殿。尊敬的狂风阴谋团邀请我们参加小型庆祝活动，我们毒语阴谋团是他们的盟友。至于裂空阴谋团……我不知道怎么会有人打算邀请他们。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔の玄関ホール。そこで名高き陰謀団による、ささやかな祝賀会が催された。我ら『毒の囁き』は彼らの望む協力者として招かれた。『傷つきし空』については…なぜ奴らが招待されるのか見当もつかない」
languages.original_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."

traits.locale_text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔の玄関ホール。そこで名高き陰謀団による、ささやかな祝賀会が催された。我ら『毒の囁き』は彼らの望む協力者として招かれた。『傷つきし空』については…なぜ奴らが招待されるのか見当もつかない」
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: "In den äußeren Hallen des Turms des plündernden Sturms. Die geschätzte Kabale hat uns eingeladen, dieser kleinen Feierlichkeit beizuwohnen. Und als erwünschter Verbündeter ist das giftige Geflüster gekommen. Aber was die Kabale der verwundeten Himmel betrifft ... Ich weiß wirklich nicht, warum man sie einladen sollte."
languages.original_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."

traits.locale_text: "In den äußeren Hallen des Turms des plündernden Sturms. Die geschätzte Kabale hat uns eingeladen, dieser kleinen Feierlichkeit beizuwohnen. Und als erwünschter Verbündeter ist das giftige Geflüster gekommen. Aber was die Kabale der verwundeten Himmel betrifft ... Ich weiß wirklich nicht, warum man sie einladen sollte."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: «Las estancias exteriores de la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. La estimada kábala nos ha invitado a una pequeña celebración. El Susurro Venenoso ha acudido con la intención de forjar una alianza con ella. En cuanto a los Cielos Heridos... no se me ocurre por qué querría nadie invitarlos».
languages.original_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."

traits.locale_text: «Las estancias exteriores de la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. La estimada kábala nos ha invitado a una pequeña celebración. El Susurro Venenoso ha acudido con la intención de forjar una alianza con ella. En cuanto a los Cielos Heridos... no se me ocurre por qué querría nadie invitarlos».
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'nin dış salonlarındasın. Saygın Kabal, bizi ufak bir kutlamayla eğlenceye davet etti. Zehirli Fısıltı'yla ittifak kurmaya can attıkları için geldik. Yaralı Gökler'e gelecek olursak... Onları kim niye davet eder, hiçbir fikrim yok."
languages.original_text: "The outer halls of the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The esteemed Kabal invited us to indulge in a small celebration. The Poisonous Whisper came as their desired allies. As for the Wounded Skies... I have no clue why one would invite them."

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga'nın Kulesinin dış salonlarındasın. Saygın Kabal, bizi ufak bir kutlamayla eğlenceye davet etti. Zehirli Fısıltı'yla ittifak kurmaya can attıkları için geldik. Yaralı Gökler'e gelecek olursak... Onları kim niye davet eder, hiçbir fikrim yok."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF
